Title: Senator Adamu still our member, says Nasarawa APC
Summary: The Nasarawa State chapter of the All Progressives Congress (APC) has refuted as false and misleading claims that a former National Chairman of the party, Senator Abdullahi Adamu, has defected to the African Democratic Congress (ADC) Senator Adamu still our member, says Nasarwa APC .

Title: Extortion Allegations: OGWAMA boss Hunye threatens legal action
Summary: Managing Director and Chief Executive Officer of Ogun State Waste Management Authority, Mr. Abayomi Hunye, has threatened to take legal action against a group of individuals claiming to be members of the Association of Waste Management Vendors .

Title: Extortion Allegations: OGWAMA boss Hunye threatens legal action
Summary: The Managing Director and Chief Executive Officer of the Ogun State Waste Management Authority (OGWAMA), Mr. Abayomi Hunye, has threatened to take legal action against a group of individuals claiming to be members of the Association of Waste Management Vendors and Recyclers of Nigeria (AWMVRN)

Title: AlphaESS inaugurates Nigerian subsidiary, commits to long-term energy transition partnership
Summary: Key stakeholders from across West Africa’s energy sector gathered today at the Lagos Marriott Hotel Ikeja for a high-level sustainability and innovation forum . Hosted by AlphaESS, the event convened approximately 150 representatives from the energy sector .

Title: NMA to withdraw medical services in Edo over kidnapped colleagues
Summary: The Nigeria Medical Association (NMA), Edo State Branch, has threatened to withdraw medical services across the state . This followed the recent abduction of two medical doctors on January 1st and 2nd, 2026 .

Title: LUTH sends nursing students home after fire outbreak
Summary: LUTH has instructed students of its College of Nursing Sciences to go on a two-week vacation . Students of the college will go on vacation following a fire outbreak in the college . LUTH sends nursing students home after fire outbreak .

Title: AFCON ’25: Nigeria vs Algeria – preview, date, time and where to watch
Summary: Nigeria will play Algeria in the quarter-final of the 2025 Africa Cup of Nations . The Super Eagles of Nigeria will face the North African giants in the last four of the tournament . Both sides are in contention for a place in the final of the AFCON '25 .

Title: Oyo records 100 farmers–herders clashes monthly — NSCDC
Summary: Oyo State Command recorded no fewer than 100 cases of farmers-herders clashes monthly in the state . The Nigeria Security and Civil Defence Corps (NSCDC) said the command recorded no more than 100 clashes monthly . The NSCDC said the clashes were recorded monthly in Oyo .

Title: Iran leader Khamenei insists ‘won’t back down’ in face of protests
Summary: Iran leader Khamenei insists ‘won’t back down’ in face of protests . Crowds of people opposed to the clerical establishment marched through major cities late Thursday . Chanting slogans including "death to the dictator" and setting fire to official buildings, crowds set fire to buildings .

Title: Trump says will meet Venezuelan opposition’s Machado ‘next week’
Summary: "I understand she's coming in next week sometime, and I look forward to saying hello to her," Trump told Fox News host Sean Hannity in an interview .
